abilities.name: Configuration: Sentry
abilities.notes: Immobilized while in Sentry Mode. Can be headshot on it's core located on the back.

abilities.name: Reconfigure
abilities.notes: Changing Modes via Reconfigure will reload your weapon.

abilities.name: Self-Repair
abilities.notes: Can be used in any mode: Recon, Sentry, or Tank. Immobilized while channeling Self-Repair.

abilities.name: Configuration: Tank (Ult)
abilities.notes: Activating Tank Mode will add 150 Armor HP to your current health, but not heal any missing health.

abilities.name: Pilot: Call Mech (Ult)
abilities.notes: Can not call a new mech after Self-Destruct until explosion has occured.

abilities.name: Mech: Defense Matrix
abilities.notes: Destroys all projectiles with its cone of effect.

abilities.name: Mech: Self-Destruct (Ult)
abilities.notes: Self-Destruct knocks back any enemies that survive the damage. Can be used during Boosters.

abilities.name: Swift Strike
abilities.notes: Swift Strike cooldown resets on any enemy elimination and on Dragonblade activation. Swift Strike can be used during Dragonblade.

abilities.name: Deflect
abilities.notes: Deflected projectiles can headshot if the original projectiles can. Deflect can be used during Dragonblade.

abilities.name: Sonic Arrow
abilities.notes: Sticks and moves along with enemy players and barriers.

abilities.name: Scatter Arrow
abilities.notes: Scatter Arrow: 6 arrows bounce x times. Scatter Arrow can do damage before spliting.

abilities.name: Dragonstrike (Ult)
abilities.notes: Dragonstrike pierces walls and shields, and travels infinitely. Touching any part of Dragonstrike deals damage. Hanzo can turn while using Dragonstrike.

abilities.name: Frag Launcher
abilities.notes: Frag Launcher bombs explode shortly after the third bounce.

abilities.name: Concussion Mine
abilities.notes: Concussion Mine inflicts no self-damage (does still knock back). Concussion Mine, Steel Trap, and Rip-Tire can be destroyed prematurely by enemy fire. Concussion Mine can not stick to enemy Heroes or shields.

abilities.name: Steel Trap
abilities.notes: Enemies stuck in Steel Trap can still fire primary weapons.

abilities.name: Rip-Tire (Ult)
abilities.notes: Rip-Tire can damage Junkrat.

abilities.name: Crossfade: Speed
abilities.notes: Increases base movement speed by ~30%.

abilities.name: Amp It Up: Speed
abilities.notes: Increases base movement speed by ~110%.

abilities.name: Combat Roll
abilities.notes: Combat Roll instantly refills ammo.

abilities.name: Deadeye
abilities.notes: Deadeye will use 50% Ultimate charge on activation, and 50% upon shooting.

abilities.name: Endothermic Blaster
abilities.notes: Each hit adds a consecutive slow to the target; Target freezes after 70 damage.

abilities.name: Cryo-Freeze
abilities.notes: A Mei in Cryo-Freeze will still contest an objective. Invunerable during Cryo-Freeze, but cannot attack or move. Casting Cryo-Freeze removes Orb of Discord.

abilities.name: Ice Wall
abilities.shield-strength: 500 Life per ice pillar, 5 pillars in total
abilities.notes: Ice Wall can be destoyed prematurely from damage.

abilities.name: Caduceus Staff: Heal
abilities.notes: Mercy does not gain charge from healing allies' self-damage.

abilities.name: Caduceus Staff: Damage
abilities.notes: The Damage Amp on Mercy's Staff is 30%. Mercy can gain charge from damage amping other players.

abilities.name: Resurrect (Ult)
abilities.notes: Must resurrect players within 10 seconds of death.

abilities.name: Rocket Launcher
abilities.notes: Rockets negate other rockets if they collide mid-air. Pharah can be hurt by own rockets. Rockets have a small amount of knockback, allowing for light rocket jumping.

abilities.name: Concussive Blast
abilities.notes: Concussive Blast knockback can be used by Pharah to cover short distances.

abilities.name: Wraith Form
abilities.notes: Immune to all damage and debuffs in Wraith Form. Activating Wraith Form dispels debuffs. Reaper can still contest an objective while in Wraith Form.

abilities.name: The Reaping
abilities.notes: Reaper will not collect Soul Globes at full health.

abilities.name: Barrier Field
abilities.notes: If Reinhardt's Barrier Field goes through all 2000 HP, it imposes a 5 second cooldown. Barrier Field prohibits the application of crowd control, debuffs, and aura heals.

abilities.name: Fire Strike
abilities.notes: Fire Strike pierces enemies and enemy barriers.

abilities.name: Earth Shatter (Ult)
abilities.notes: Earth Shatter can be held to delay activation (Hammer.....Down).

abilities.name: Scrap Gun (Alt-fire)
abilities.range: Explodes to Scrap Gun projectile after 5 meters

abilities.name: Chain Hook
abilities.notes: Does not pierce Barriers.

abilities.name: Take a Breather
abilities.notes: Roadhog can not move during Take a Breather.

abilities.name: Whole Hog
abilities.notes: Whole Hog does knockback to enemy Heroes.

abilities.name: Helix Rockets
abilities.notes: Helix Rockets have no ammo cost. Cannot use Helix Rockets while Sprinting. Attempting to activate it will stop Sprint.

abilities.name: Biotic Field
abilities.notes: Using Biotic Field while Sprinting stops Sprint.

abilities.name: Tactical Visor
abilities.notes: Activating Tactical Visor refills ammo. Reload time is reduced by 50% during Tactical Visor.

abilities.name: Photon Projector
abilities.damage: Lvl 1: 30 dps, Lvl 2: 60 dps, Lvl 3: 120 dps
abilities.notes: Damage level increases 1 level per second as beam is attached.

abilities.name: Photon Projector (Alt-fire)
abilities.notes: Charged shot pierces enemies and enemy barriers.

abilities.name: Sentry Turret
abilities.notes: Sentry Turrets have 1 Life.

abilities.name: Photon Shield
abilities.notes: Photon Shield lasts the life of attached player, or until Symmetra switches Heroes. Photon Shield recharges ~3 seconds after receiving damage (25 shield hp per sec, 3 sec recharge).

abilities.name: Teleporter (Ult)
abilities.notes: Teleporter has 200 Life.

abilities.name: Armor Pack
abilities.notes: Armor HP given by Armor Pack does not stack. Max Added Armor is 75.  Players with 75 added Armor can't pickup more. Only 10 Armor Packs can be down at a time.

abilities.name: Molten Core (Ult)
abilities.notes: Torbjorn gets 200 Life, 300 Armor during the Molten Core. Molten Core automatically upgrades turrets from Level 2 to Level 3. Molten Core increases Rivet Gun to 2.5 rps, Rivet Gun (Alt-Fire) to 1.75 rps, and Forge Hammer to 2 swing/sec.

abilities.name: Torbjorn's Turret
abilities.fire-rate: Level 1: 2 rps, Level 2: 4 rps, Level 3: 5 rps + 4 rocket dps
abilities.notes: Level 1: 150 Life, Level 2: 300 Life, Level 3: 800 Life. Repairing your turret has no cost (50 HP per swing). Repairing your turret takes precedence over upgrading.

abilities.name: Blink
abilities.notes: Tracer can blink in any horizontal direction.

abilities.name: Recall
abilities.notes: Recall will remove Orbs of Discord. Recall will not regain lost armor or shield HP.

abilities.name: Pulse Bomb
abilities.headshot: yes, initial stick can crit, explosion cannot
abilities.notes: Tracer can be damaged by her own Pulse Bomb.

abilities.name: Widow's Kiss (Sniper)
abilities.notes: Can be activated by holding right click. Widow's Kiss: Sniper charges to 100% in 1 sec.

abilities.name: Grappling Hook
abilities.notes: Grappling Hook will not go on cooldown if it doesn't connect.

abilities.name: Venom Mine
abilities.range: 3 meter radius on poison gas explosion
abilities.notes: Arrow above Venom Mine designates a mine is already planted.

abilities.name: Infra-Sight
abilities.notes: Widowmaker and all of her team can see enemies through walls during the Infra-Sight.

abilities.name: Tesla Cannon
abilities.notes: Tesla Cannon automatically targets all enemies in field of view.

abilities.name: Barrier Projector
abilities.notes: Barrier Projector can not be used during Primal Rage. Barrier Projector blocks all debuffs, crowd controls, and aura heals.

abilities.name: Primal Rage
abilities.notes: Winston has 900 Life, 100 Armor during Primal Rage. dPrimal Rage increases speed and health. Primal Rage fully heals Winston at the time of use.

abilities.name: Particle Barrier
abilities.notes: Barriers do NOT charge Ultimate meter. Damage amp from Barriers degrades at 2 per sec. Damage amp from Barriers increases at 3 per 5 shield damage taken.

abilities.name: Projected Barrier
abilities.notes: Barriers do NOT charge Ultimate meter. Damage amp from Barriers degrades at 2 per sec. Damage amp from Barriers increases at 3 per 5 shield damage taken.

abilities.name: Orb of Harmony
abilities.duration: Returns to Zenyatta if target is out of sight for more than 3 seconds.
abilities.notes: Orb of Harmony will not charge the Ultimate meter if not healing. New Orbs of Discord and Harmony originate from Zenyatta.

abilities.name: Orb of Discord
abilities.duration: Returns to Zenyatta if target is out of sight for more than 3 seconds.
abilities.notes: Orb of Discord increases damage taken by 50%. Orb of Discord does not pierce barriers.

abilities.name: Trancendence (Ult)
abilities.notes: Immune to damage during Trancendence but can be crowd controlled.
